caption.p: ( A) Sample and program temperature for a quenching experiment of 69.615 mg EN AW-6005 from 540 °C to isothermal soaking at 350 °C in a Perkin Elmer Pyris 1 DSC; ( B) Sample and program temperature for the first seconds of isothermal holding at different soaking temperatures. In ( B), the zero value of the time axis corresponds to the start of isothermal soaking according to the program temperature.
